title.rendered: JOB POST: Senior Project Engineer Network Admin at CDAC, Delhi [3 Posts; Salary Upto Rs.1,00,000; 3 Years Exp]: Apply by May 24

content.rendered:
CDAC invites applications for Senior Project Engineer Network Admin at CDAC Delhi. The last date to apply for this post is May 24, 2023.

About CDAC

Center for Development of Advanced Computing (C-DAC) is a self-governing scientific body of India under the Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology. CDAC is the premier R&D organization of the Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) for carrying out R&D in IT, Electronics and associated areas. Different areas of C-DAC had originated at other times, many of which came out due to the identification of opportunities.

Number of Posts

3

Job Profile Description

  • Participate in requirements analysis.
  • Collaborate with internal teams for Network infrastructure design and architecture.
  • Test and deploy systems.
  • Improve existing infrastructure.
  • Documentation throughout the design, planning, implementation, monitoring, change control, and maintenance.
  • Serve as an expert on Network Infrastructure and provide technical support.
  • Meeting with client to determine requirements of LAN and WAN Network.
  • Analyzing system requirements.
  • Developing technical specifications.
  • Reviewing configurations.
  • Providing support to colleagues’ support team.
  • Drafting operating procedures.
  • Training to colleague staff.
  • Adhering to all IT network compliance, procedure, and internal and external audits, formulated DR/BCP procedures and practices.
  • Project management along with client Project Team (Internal & client) for smooth implementation of new business setup or ramp-up of existing businesses.
  • Network Technology SPOC for Client/Customer requirements like all types of communication, client meetings, and resolution of escalations.
  • RCA Review, SOPs review, and weekly/monthly reports review and submitting to Management, reviewing team’s performance, Mentoring, and guiding team for their skill improvements.

Required Skill Sets

  • Experience in Designing, implementing, and maintaining the legacy and next generation of network systems, Adept at implementing networking protocols to provide effective services and boost daily networking activities & ongoing network projects.
  • Hands-on – Routers/Switches/Firewalls including NAT, VPN, SFR, WLC, AP, and Firewalls. Network Tools – Solar Winds, Kiwi Syslog, Kiwi Cat Tools, Ethereal, Cisco ISE, etc.
  • Full accountability for managing day-to-day network changes, including Firewall Changes and hardware or software modifications.
  • Excellency in planning Major activities or changes in Infra to accomplish a minimal Business impact.
  • Possessing Excellent troubleshooting, analyzing, and problem-solving skills in Lan/Wan and firewall
  • Process & delivery excellence, Datacentre relocation including overall workflow; Ensuring process &compliance with client requirements.
  • Skill set in implementing policies and procedures of various compliance like ISO27001, BCP, PCI, GDPR, and compliance initiative.
  • Knowledge and experience in Service Management concepts, including Incident, Change, and problem management.
  • Accomplished multiple SP connectivity and redundancy, analysis of all applicable Service Improvement Plans with SP.
  • EMS tools: Knowledge NMS, EMS tools, the configuration of devices and parameters in tool and monitoring, Helpdesk ticketing tool.
  • Expertise in TCP/IP, Subnetting, and allocation of IP Addressing.
  • Configuration of IP Routing using Static Routes, RIP, IGRP, EIGRP, BGP, and OSPF.
  • Perform firmware and driver updates of Network equipment.
  • Manage tasks, events, and alarms Health status of Network and network security equipment
  • Manage and administer Windows server roles – Active Directory, DHCP, DNS, WSUS, File Server, Print Server, and IIS Server.
  • Implement and Manage HA and Failover.

Additional Skill Sets

  • Excellent troubleshooting and communication skills.
  • Should have an understanding and experience of industry best practices on configuration.
  • Excellent business communication skills.
  • Good documentation and presentation skills.

Salary

Approx Rs. 1,00,000/- pm, salary offer will be commensurate to qualification & relevant experience.

Qualification and Experience

  • 3-7 years experience.
  • First Class (60 % or 6.75 CGPA) BE/B. Tech with any Specialization OR;
  • First Class (60 % or 6.75 CGPA) MCA OR;
  • First Class (60 % or 6.75 CGPA) Post Graduate degree in Science / Computer Application.

Deadline

The last to apply for the post is May 24, 2023 (up to 18:00 hrs.)

How to Apply?

Interested candidates can apply for this post through this link.

Location

Delhi, Anywhere in India.

Click here to view the official notification of the Senior Project Engineer Network Admin at CDAC Delhi.
